about_the_game:
Contained is a monster pet simulator where you are sealed inside a sci-fi facility alongside some moody monsters.
Your role is to take care of these monsters and use their powers to keep the base running.
As your pet monsters evolves, they will uncover new skills, moods and resources.
But beware, monsters have a mind of their own and can be dangerous!

Monster Pet Simulator
Take care of your monsters and watch them grow.
Keep a monster happy, feed it, play with it, and make sure it doesn't get lost for too long.

Base Management
Use your monsters to run and upgrade the facility.
Generate resources, power machines, and keep the lights on.
Can you keep the base running and uncover the secrets of the facility?

Uncover the story
As you progress through the game, you will uncover the story of the facility and the monsters within.
How did you end up here? What is the purpose of the facility?

Complex simulation
The facility stands in a delicate balance. Your input is required to manage and optimize all these interlocking systems.
